page.title: 04CHANDLER'S FORD LIBRARY (2)
page.content: Wednesday. There are three{Chartered {Librarians.}They have taken exams.One of them is the Branch Librarian;there is also a Reference Librarian and a Children's Librarian. They supervise the Assistants and work similar hours.Assistant Librarians tidy the shelves,repair books, and stamp them in and out at the counter. There is a security device to prevent theft of books. As you go through the exit turnstile an alarm sounds if you have not had your book stamped. By next year there will be plastic computerised cards instead of a card catalogue of books borrowed. There is already a computer which you put microfiche in. This tells you title, author,name of the book and how many copies of the book there are in Hampshire,and in which libraries
